api_list.name: /api/token/revoke
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://torque.p.rapidapi.com/api/token/revoke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torque.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/accounts/{account}/login

schema.description:
Describes the authentication server response if the request for an access token is valid
<remarks>
 Contains access token and some additional properties about the authorization
</remarks>

access_token.description: Access token string as issued by the authorization server

refresh_token.description: Refresh token to be used to extend existing session

token_type.description: Token type, typically just the string "bearer"
